website_summaries.verdict: Couples and friends alike will appreciate this roomy, 2-person hammock tent.
pros: Comes with 2 tree-saver straps and 2 carabiners
Hammock is reversible—just flip over when you no longer want to use the mosquito net
cons: Mosquito net not as bug-proof as advertised

customer_reviews.title: Looks great... feels better!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only use this Hamic a couple of times but in the few times that I’ve use that I’ve been extremely satisfied. It goes up in less than two minutes and comes down in about the same amount of time. It’s 30 and has no problem holding me... A 210 pound male. They can’t come on baby come on oveI’ve only use this Hamic a couple of times but in the few times that I’ve use that I’ve been extremely satisfied. It goes up in less than two minutes and comes down in about the same amount of time. It’s 30 and has no problem holding me... A 210 pound male.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon Carr

customer_reviews.title: Best Outdoor Sleep Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hammock, granted it's my first time sleeping in one, but I was pleasantly surprised how well I slept. Switched to this the last night of scout camp as we had to be up early to take tents down. This made the morning go so much faster, unsnap a couple clips, stuff the thing away and we were ready and helped the rest of the troop members load the trailer. Definitely earned a permanent spot in my pack! The net worked perfect as promised, no bug bites, and paired with a hammock fly we were nice and dry from the light rain that moved through.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L

customer_reviews.title: mosquito net is really no-rip!
customer_reviews.text: When I first got into this hammock the first time is set it up, I accidentally leaned back too far and ended up sitting in the mosquito net part instead of the hammock part. To my surprise, the mosquito net didn't rip!! I'm 150 pounds and still did not damage the netting at all. I'm super impressed! Even though this is said to be a double, I would not imagine putting more than one person in here but that wasn't my plan when I bought it so it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great until failure
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 3 years taking it camping probably less than 2 dozen nights. On vacation and just hanging out in the hammock and it tore right in the middle and my butt hit the ground. No previous rips or other reason for it to fail in the middle. I don't know how long they think this should last but I would think longer than it did
customer_reviews.author: Concious Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money - I'd easily recommend one ...
customer_reviews.text: So comfy and it keeps the bugs off too! The fabric is much softer than I thought it would be and the bug netting is very generously sized. Good product for the money - I'd easily recommend one of these to my friends looking to get a hammock with bugnet combo without taking a big hit to the wallet. NOTE: I've yet to find a sewn on bug net that hasn't had some issues with drooping, this one was no exception. However it is less of a problem with this hammock than with most that I've tried so far.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but not quite perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a father's day gift for my dad to use with a portable stand for RV camping. It worked out great: he as well as my children and myself all used it and enjoyed it. The material is durable and holds up well to heavy weight. It is also lightweight and breathable. Two reasons for only 4 stars. It tends to curl up around you. It also wasn't as wide as I expected based on the pictures and description. Overall I am satisfied, though. So is my dad!
customer_reviews.author: Ti

customer_reviews.title: Great Entry Kit but Delicate Net Design
customer_reviews.text: The hammock is overall a good value. I have a number of different hammocks for different adventures. But was intrigued by the integrated net at the price for this one. Have taken this on a few trips now and can say overall it’s pretty comfortable. The biggest issue I have with this hammock is the quality of the bug net, rips very easily. Would be nice if it had some additional attachment points to connect a ridge line to, which you find in some of the more expensive brands. Overall good value and great entry kit for those who are just starting to hammock camp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If It Wasn't For the Zipper
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and size. Only complaint is the zippers aren't double sided. Serious flaw, otherwise it would be 5 Star. I can't imagine it would cost much more for a double zipper.
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: worked exactly like I hoped it would
customer_reviews.text: Pro's: -Zipper is smooth -All materials are quality and tough -Looks cool -Ample room in the hammock -Enough room in the pouch for the hammock, straps and carabiners -Super easy set up (I use my own knots for the netting suspension) -Came with a little bonus surprise (I won't ruin it for ya) Con's -bulkier compared to regular hammocks without any netting. -friends get jealous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the ease of unpacking and packing the hammock, the quality of construction, and the comfort of using this hammock and bug screen. I definitely recommend this product to weight conscious campers.
customer_reviews.author: John Prentiss

customer_reviews.title: Poor workmanship
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hammock 1year ago. I have used it for 4 overnight camping trips. When I went to put it away for storage I noticed the stitching and seam that holds the bug net to the hammock loose. There are two places where the seem has completely let go. Nothing is torn or damaged except the stitching. This is unfortunate because I really liked the hammock. ****Update**** I attempted to contact the manufacturer. I emailed, called (could only get voice mail) and tried their on-line *help* chat. No contact, no answers, no replies. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY WITH THIS COMPANY!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Who knew sleeping in a Hammock could be so great!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed that I could wake up in the morning without any aches and pains. This is the way to camp. The hammock comes with great hanging straps, caribeeners, and ties. I liked the internal and external pockets. I did put a tarp over it for weather protection and added a bandana on each end for a drip path if it rained. Stayed dry and comfortable all night.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A. Folwick

customer_reviews.title: Big and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Replacing a cheaper lighter hammock that failed. This one is much sturdier and I like the high quality zippers. It's much wider than necessary for one person. If you're going minimal or a kid/smaller person you might want a smaller size. I saved a bunch of weight & money by using bulk 1/2" tubular webbing for straps, it's plenty.
customer_reviews.author: N. Vonnahme

customer_reviews.title: I've tried other hammocks and they have been too small to be comfortable. This one is longer and wider than most ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'3" and 190 lbs. I've tried other hammocks and they have been too small to be comfortable. This one is longer and wider than most and it allows me to get a very comfortable diagonal lay in the hammock. I'd rather sleep in this than in my $4000 tempurpedic mattress! Don't think the wife would like that though... It is also pretty light and compact, the tree straps are plenty long and seem to be very well made. I would recommend this without reservation!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Arensmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Worth more than what you pay for it.
customer_reviews.text: Got this hammock few days ago, got it out and put it up to look it over and get a feel for it and compared to some other hammock i have bought this hammock is well put together.Lots of room and the hammock and the straps are well made. It is and does just what they say it will do and for the quality of this hammock the price is less than what you would expect to pay for one of this quality .
customer_reviews.author: valid54

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, cant wait for a version 2
customer_reviews.text: Room for improvement, slightly less comfortable with the bug net not in use due to the elastic strap. Somewhat hard to get out of when using the bug net opening being smaller than id like. Would love and absolutely buy an improved version where the bug net zipped all the way off. Otherwise has held my 300+(what, with my boots and edc gear) lbs self just fine and quite comfortable and roomy
customer_reviews.author: tamrax

customer_reviews.title: Strong, fast, comfortable, and versatile, but heavy and big for storage
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly happy eith this hammock. It is versatile and simple, while still being sturdy and trustworthy. It is portable, though does lean a little on the heavy/ big side while in containment. The straps are a remarkable asset and make the whole hammock fast to set up and feel great while in use. The reversible net set-up is great for backpacking use and keeps the bugs and mosquitos at bay well. I love my hammock and would definitely purchase from Everest again
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Peake

customer_reviews.title: great quality, excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable hammock! And the quality appears to be excellent. I especially appreciate the attention to detail, like the inside hanging loops and pocket. Their customer service is also top notch. There was a stitching issue with the first one I received and they immediately replaced it at no cost. The second is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep Iv'e had when camping
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait so long to get this? I havn't used my tent since I bought this. The straps have yet to slip down a tree. The net does occasionally get caught in the zipper so be careful. It hasn't done any damage to it however.
customer_reviews.author: Notnamedsteve

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought three for a hiking weekend. Set up before trip to make sure all the components were there and checked ease of use. Worked great all weekend. Came home with three still perfect hammocks. Bug net is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: The best Hammock I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: These are the best hammocks by far on amazon! Quick and easy set up, speedy delivery, excellent customer service and a fantastic quality product. I've owned several hammocks and this is easily the best. It's highly durable, lightweight, easy to pack, low footprint, has great build quality and so easy to setup. After buying one, and experiencing how great they are I immediately bought another one for my partner. I even made a mistake with my order and they immediately resolved my problem without any issue at all. If you're considering buying a hammock look no further - you've found the right one.
customer_reviews.author: Manuela

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality
customer_reviews.text: I've been sleeping in this hammock every night for almost a week now and I must say, this is the best hammock I've ever owned. It's made of high quality material, it has a pocket for gear, it looks amazing, and it's incredibly comfortable. I would definitely recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: This is the ultimate hammock for adventuring!
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start? This hammock is absolutely awesome! It is an incredible value for this price point, it really comes with everything you need to get setup! I have taken this hammock to several National Parks. It worked great for backpacking. The quick setup allowed me to use it in numerous places including a few peaks. It sets up 2 minutes or less. Extremely comfortable, I am 6” and was able to get a mostly flat angle. I sleep better than in my bed at home. I highly recommend this product, so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Bernardini

customer_reviews.title: Very very satisfied with how Tim from manufacturing at Everest Hammocks handled ...
customer_reviews.text: So the hammock arrived as expected, but there were minor unforeseen defects that threatened the strength of the fabric causing a rip. Very very satisfied with how Tim from manufacturing at Everest Hammocks handled the situation. Before speaking with Tim I was certain I would not buy Everest products in the future, Tim showed passion for the consumer and I will say, Good quality Customer service is hard to find. I will most definitely continue to shop Everest.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Love, nice if there was a single, but my netting ripped near top where it’s hung, great double zipper
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: The straps going through it need loops not knots. This one has that.!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ya I really like this Hammock it seems to be very sturdy and very secure I tried another brand and it actually came loose in the middle of night and I fell and kind a got hurt a little bit so I’m real happy with this one and the tree saver straps are cool to
customer_reviews.author: Zephyr

customer_reviews.title: only used on trail once...not again
customer_reviews.text: first, if you do purchase, consider getting the double layered version to hold a sleeping pad/other insulation. I wished i had. However, I have only slept in this on one hiking trip, and will retire it after that. it was ok, but not great. I would rather have the bug net separate from my hammock in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: The has all hammock
customer_reviews.text: Very Pleased with Hammock .Has room , comfortable ,and the bug screen a great feature . Looking forward using . Shipped quickly , got in a couple days after purchase .
customer_reviews.author: gh

customer_reviews.title: Good Investment. The only one I'll have to buy.
customer_reviews.text: I like this hammock a lot! I was willing to spend extra on American made. All of the material is top quality, and I know this will last many years. The zipper and net are excellent! It's roomy, nice to look at and feels very comfortable. Since I bought quality, one star off for workmanship. Threads are visible (pics). Otherwise, I strongly recommend this hammock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I have owned for less than a year. used it 5 times. Mosquito netting has already developed holes/tears and the fabric is fraying all along the zipper. very disappointed in quality/ durability. otherwise a good product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for great hammock camping.
customer_reviews.text: The size of the double hammock fits me at 6'4". I have a very bad back and found this to help relieve the pain from walking a couple miles in the woods.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I love it and it does not only keep out mosquitos ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it and it does not only keep out mosquitos but angry bees as well. The first night I used this product I did not know that I have up camp next to a bees nest due to that, I can set up anywhere I please.When I awaken there where bees hitting my hammock but none wear able to sting me. Getting out was a different story, I use the hammock to cover my upper part of my body so I won't get stung (I was wearing pants) loosen the straps got everything together and left the bee alone. I will highly recommend. Insects will not get in the hammock. Mainly the flying types (bees in my case).
customer_reviews.author: luis munoz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Received the hammock for Christmas and got it out 3-4 times this year. It was comfortable and good quality. A small tear appeared at the base of the mosquito net with the hammock. Customer service was great, fulfilled the warranty, and provided another one.
customer_reviews.author: Danny L Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Quality is very good, and appears to be very durable. Mosquito netting works great and is easy to use. Very comfortable after a little break in period for me. Judy
customer_reviews.author: Judy Cash

customer_reviews.title: ENO double hammock
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had a chance to use this yet, however everything seems very well constructed and it is very lightweight. There were no issues of any kind quality wise or with packaging. I very much so look forward to using my new Hammock hopefully within the next few weeks. Will update if any issues arise.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mcdermond

customer_reviews.title: no mosquitos and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The hammock is very comfortable. I took it camping to lake Tahoe, it is the first time I use a hammock instead of a tent. I found the hammock very comfortable. I will definitely try this on one of my back packing trips.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Durability and the mosquito net
customer_reviews.text: If it was double lined so I could put my sleeping pad under me without it moving around. The straps could be longer because I have some really big trees in Oregon and sometimes it’s hard to find trees small enough for the straps
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best hammock I own so far. Full hammock, rain fly, bug net sets. This one is quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua C.

customer_reviews.title: Basically what you would expect. the first time i ...
customer_reviews.text: Basically what you would expect. the first time i used it i ripped the pocket but everything else has been holding up. Four straps would make it open wider and not swing so much in the breeze
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The straps are great, not to fond of the bug net
customer_reviews.text: It is big enough for two people but it remains to preach have small little holes that will evenly get bigger. The straps are great, not to fond of the bug net, it’s not that bad though. It’s an okay hammock for hanging around. Idk if I would trust it for long backpacking trips though
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: This is a great way to camp in luxury
customer_reviews.text: The awesomest in bug protection. Cereal! This is a great way to camp in luxury. Don't forget, if your not careful when you unhook the ends, you'll be re-inserting the hoop for the carribeener through the whole thing. Twice now, hahahaha....
customer_reviews.author: hojpoj

customer_reviews.title: Do not use for bug net
customer_reviews.text: I went on an extensive camping trip to the boundary waters and had need of a hammock with a bug net. This was most recommended and seemed like a perfect fit. On the first day, the bug net ripped. So if your intention is similar, I would go a different route until that is fixed. Other than that, it was very comfortable and the rest seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Nothing better.
customer_reviews.text: The Hammock is like being on air super soft, plenty of room to roll around. I have slept in it for two nights during the winter with a big sleeping bag and air mat and still had room, customer service is exceptional I won't go with any other company.
customer_reviews.author: Amabuyingstuff Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product, I tested it out for several nights and it worked great. The zipper separating the hammock from the bug net worth flawlessly
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Enos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Hammocks well made my teensger and husband love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra Stowe

customer_reviews.title: Good hammock
customer_reviews.text: The material used for the hammock is tough enough to hold me at 300. The zipper is
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff. Don't assume quality is as low as price.
customer_reviews.text: Got mine a couple weeks ago but just now had a chance to use it. I have to say it's impressive at any price point, but REALLY impressive at this price point. Well done, guys. Really well done.
customer_reviews.author: DerrickDilts

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable nights sleep
customer_reviews.text: Setup was quick and easy for my first time hammock camping. The double nest gave me plenty of room to move around and add my sleeping bag which was nice since we were in the low 40's that weekend. I'll be adding proper gear later on and hope to put this hammock through more of a long term test. I'll update the review as needed if I remember.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aweso
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how great and easy this is! Durable for my 7 & 9 yo, easy to set-up for this city gal, and super nice feature to have the mosquito net! All-in-one straps and attached bag made it a snap to take up and down. Love the color. Was looking at traditional REI hammocks and glad I went with this!
customer_reviews.author: K. Francis

customer_reviews.title: I was pleased to see the manufacturer incorporated these upgrades to the ...
customer_reviews.text: As I read the other reviews and suggestions made about this Hammock. I was pleased to see the manufacturer incorporated these upgrades to the new design. I plan to use this camping with my scouts and will be using it this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product, comfortable, versitile
customer_reviews.text: Great hammock, good quality, I set it up in the living room and watch TV. So versitile I love the fact that you can flip it when you don't need the bug netting, I've used it to hold a sleeping bag as an under quilt on cold nights. Now the Bad.....I don't like the compression strap on the stuff sack..it drags the floor and sometimes my foot gets caught in when leaving the hammock. So I cut mine off.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: All I know is this is the best purchase I have made on a long time. The comfort, the easy set up, bug free. The double hammock is the way to go! So much room and more comfort. I have spread the word about my new love. Sometimes I wanna just sleep outside under the stars. You won't regret buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Dahm

customer_reviews.title: Great for Backpacking.
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today and I gave it a test set-up. It seems like a great product and it's by far the best price I found on a hammock with a mosquito net and straps. The cool thing is you can leave all the guide wires attached and the straps fit into the stuff sack. It's way easier and lighter than a lot of other sleep systems. Can't wait to take it into the forest!
customer_reviews.author: The Old Beekeeper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for one, but gets a little crowded with my dog
customer_reviews.text: worth the extra money. All parts are high quality and the built in mosquito net is perfect for FL.
customer_reviews.author: Arlo

customer_reviews.title: This hammock was made for the camper in everyone!
customer_reviews.text: I've not used it for long periods of time...yet...but it came with everything described, works like it should, and is easy to put up and take down...even with the netting being used. And I appreciate the inside loops to hand a small fan and/or light.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Epps

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: The product quality is great, can't wait to take this on my outdoor adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: This hammock is amazing, the mosquito net could be easier to put up, but otherwise it works better than any other hammock I have had. The straps are nice and long to get around big tree's. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L

customer_reviews.title: Great Hammock!
customer_reviews.text: Great hammock for the price. The YKK zipper for the bug net is nice and heavy duty. Being that this is a double hammock, one can lay at an angle and get the perfect flat lay. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good company
customer_reviews.text: Company was very interested in making sure I was a satisfied with my purchase, which I was.
customer_reviews.author: Candice B.

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, I have only used it once so far ...
customer_reviews.text: Light weigh, strong and, comfortable, I have only used it once so far but, I slept well in it. I should have got the rain cover for it but, it stayed warm inside with my sleeping bag. (Went down to 45f) I wouldn't use it in the winter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not only the biggest most comfortable hammock I own but it's backed by the best ...
customer_reviews.text: Not only the biggest most comfortable hammock I own but it's backed by the best customer service I have ever received. A product that not only functions but is made by people who genuinely care about your experience is a beautiful almost unheard of thing these days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice hammock combo!
customer_reviews.text: This kit comes with everything you need to sleep in the trees! Add a rainfly and sleeping bag and you're ready for 3 seasons of camping in comfort. Do be careful when climbing in - make sure that your weight lands on only the hammock portion and not the bug net. I tore mine and customer service was willing to work with me. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price (purchased at around $60 or ...
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price (purchased at around $60 or 65). Quick and easy to setup. My son loves it. I will probably get one in the future to make camping quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sam the Man

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Hammock!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable hammock! I particularly like the included bug screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hammock
customer_reviews.text: Great product and customer service. Mosquito net comes in handy in Texas
customer_reviews.author: jeff p.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Wish it came with thicker ties (tree awareness). Good quality though
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great hammocks love the bug net
customer_reviews.text: This is the second hammock I've bought. Great hammocks love the bug net. I would say they are just as good as ENO which I also have. And much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice hammock. Sturdy and comfortable. Bug screen is a must!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Zorger

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, delivery was fast, use is easy and the hammock is comfortable. Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Reese

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well resistant
customer_reviews.text: Hello, how are you, I just arrived in Brazil and I'm really enjoying the product! Comfortable and well resistant! I am very satisfied! Thanks for your feedback! If I need to, I'll get in touch! Happy new year, Tom!
customer_reviews.author: Leandro

customer_reviews.title: Hammock is a great buy at the price point
customer_reviews.text: Hammock is a great buy at the price point. Perfect for a casual camper. Slept well - tons of room. I modified the bug fly to mount to a solid rope tied between the same 2 trees the hammock was so it was more taught - but tons of flexibility there. Straps are basically the same design as the standard ENO straps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such a great hammock
customer_reviews.text: I just did a Road trip across the USA east to west coast and this hammock was perfect at any conditions,love it
customer_reviews.author: Yamz Garcia

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product followed up closely by a great company
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product followed up closely by a great company. I had an issue with the product that I brought to the attention of the seller before leaving a review. They were more than willing to accommodate my needs. I had the opportunity to use this hammock recently and it was awesome. Highly recommend this product and this company to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kahwaji

customer_reviews.title: Works great! You may need additional tree straps and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! You may need additional tree straps and I wish the two storage bags clipped together.
customer_reviews.author: almeyse

customer_reviews.title: Get to the hammock
customer_reviews.text: First time i used it the the strap broke im kinda bummed out.😞🤬
customer_reviews.author: Peddle to the metal

customer_reviews.title: Good price great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up good quality comfortable.Would recommend it to anyone who hammock camps.this may sound petty but a nice sticker to advertise your product would have been a nice touch
customer_reviews.author: DAN R

customer_reviews.title: Good hammock
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Only used it once so far but was pretty easy and super sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Carl Snyder

customer_reviews.title: It is light and big .
customer_reviews.text: It could have had 2 ropes and 2 straps to hold it up .
customer_reviews.author: Dean D.

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock
customer_reviews.text: This was my first hammock and loved it. The bug net could have had a few more tie downs it’s in your face
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great hammock. Super comfy and easy to set up. Little heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Shane A. Nearhoof

customer_reviews.title: No rain fly
customer_reviews.text: Love it the only thing I didn’t like about the purchase is it didn’t come with a rain fly
customer_reviews.author: Hightower

customer_reviews.title: but all is good with the prompt customer service and a replacement hammock ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a couple of issues when received it, broken buckle and snag in netting, but all is good with the prompt customer service and a replacement hammock in the mail
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock!
customer_reviews.text: Small issue with the net but customer service was quick to fix the problem! Slept like a baby camping all weekend in this hammock!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I change my ratings... I had missing parts. contacted Everest active gear and responded very fast. thanks
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful hammock and seems to be quality made. Really enjoyed it thus far! Also, the mosquito net is a nice add-on!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B Keck

customer_reviews.title: Quality hammock for the price
customer_reviews.text: The quality appears to be very good. Hanging was easy and the bug net was nice. Had to figure out how to keep the net away from my head but that wasn't difficult. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great prize and even better design
customer_reviews.text: The hammock I've been looking for!! Great prize and even better design, but some seams where already coming apart upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Hangs up quick, and the thick zippers make the bug net easy to get inside of.
customer_reviews.author: OrganicCorey

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t even had it a full year and it ripped by the paracord/ carabiner. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a week at Boy Scout Summer Camp it performed GREAT. very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I used this hammock for a week at Boy Scout Summer Camp it performed GREAT. very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles N Postle

customer_reviews.title: Everest hammock
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product but the bug net seems to hang low into my face. I don't know why and can't figure out how to prevent it from sagging onto the sides of my face when trying to relax.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bag ripped off
customer_reviews.text: Great design. My stuff sack bag ripped off after a month and a half. This company has great service if you have an issue. They allow multiple options to fix any issue. They took care of me. Bug net works great and the design is perfect
customer_reviews.author: John Dopplick

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock, super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great hammock, super comfortable and holds both my girlfriend and me very comfortably. We've camped in it several times.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Keene

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Hammock
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for chillin' at the river, or overnight camping. Bonus mosquito net for uninterrupted sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Sean D.

customer_reviews.title: Was great I added about 4 feet of Nylon 700LBS on ...
customer_reviews.text: Was great I added about 4 feet of Nylon 700LBS on each end to allow a longer distance between trees. Was a great product, girlyfriend liked being able to escape from the bugs!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron M.

customer_reviews.title: Grrreeat!!!
customer_reviews.text: Truly a decent hammock considering the fact it’s a lower end product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M Barker

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as expected and met my expectations. Can't wait to use it more!
customer_reviews.author: Will K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but we need an under quilt to keep warm
customer_reviews.author: Jpine

customer_reviews.title: Greatest hammock
customer_reviews.text: I live this hammock! My husbands favorite part is that the fabric breathes so he keeps cool on this beautiful summer day.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie s

customer_reviews.title: He used it camping in Fort Bragg and worked great!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! He used it camping in Fort Bragg and worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Everest Double Camping Hammock with Mosquito Net | Bug-Free Camping, Backpacking & Survival Outdoor Hammock Tent | Reversible, Integrated, Lightweight, Ripstop Nylon
feature_bullets: ✅ COMPLETE YOSEMITE PACK - There are all kinds of hammocks and accessories on the market, but very few can compete with the quality you'll find with Everest Active Gear. We include a practical integrated bug net with the double hammock because, if you're like us, nature is your therapy so you can rest well, sleeping bug free. This covered hammock will give you the comfort of being indoors while still enjoying the outdoors, a perfect choice for backpacking, hiking, camping, and more!

✅ ​​RIPSTOP DIAMOND WEAVE NYLON - We use colors designed to blend into your surroundings for extra, military grade camouflage. Our durable 100% 210T taffeta parachute made with quick dry diamond-weave nylon fabric is breathable, ultralight, and high-tensile. The YKK double tab zip and components triple-stitched edge seams are able to hold up to 400 lbs. At 10ft long and 6ft wide, our hammocks are comfortably large enough for two and nicely spacious for a single person!

✅ ​​HEAVY DUTY MOSQUITO MESH - Our unique net design provides an internal space without the feeling of being enclosed or claustrophobic and is compatible with most RainFly setups. Made from heavy grade polyester 31gm fabric, our nets won't pull or tear out hang tabs like others. This 2100 holes per square inch No-See-Um bug netting is premium quality so you can relax bug and mosquito free. You won't need to haul tents and sleeping bags on your next trip with our fully enclosed, netted shelter!

✅​​ ​​EASY STEP SET UP & FULLY REVERSIBLE - Our Innovative 2 person hammock net system allows for a quick and simple setup perfect for travel, and complete with FULL set up instructions! Our easily portable, lightweight hammock is designed to simply be flipped over for use with or without the mosquito net. The ultra strong straps, included with your purchase, can be easily fastened to any sturdy trees or poles.

✅ 30 DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - We adhere to a full 30-day return policy with a money back guarantee on all of our products, no questions asked! As a small business we back our product quality and supply product support so you can rest well!
